main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed near Randolph AFB, Texas on June 12, 1952, for about 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared about three times as bright as Venus,The object was observed to be four times as fast as an F-86 jet,It was described as being bright bluish-white in color,About 15 to 20 objects were observed one at a time,The sighting occurred from a drive-in theater near Randolph AFB.
witness description: Officer of the Physiology Branch of the Aero Medical Lab, WADC
